me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.menu.sign

Interface SignGUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSignGUIManager, PacketAPISignGUI, ProtocolLibSignGUI

    public interface SignGUI
    Represents a manager of sign editor interfaces that can be used by plugins. The instance of this interface can be retrieved via the Bukkit service manager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void open(Player player, ResultReceived<Player,java.lang.String[]> response)
      Opens a blank sign editor GUI for the specified player.
      void open(Player player, java.lang.String[] defaultText, ResultReceived<Player,java.lang.String[]> response)
      Opens a sign editor GUI for the specified player with text already in it.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(@Nonnull
        Player player,
        @Nullable
        ResultReceived<Player,java.lang.String[]> response)
        Opens a blank sign editor GUI for the specified player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the editor will be displayed.
        response - The object which will handle the completion of sign editing. The source is the player, the result is the input value from the sign GUI.

      • open

        void open(@Nonnull
        Player player,
        @Nullable
        java.lang.String[] defaultText,
        @Nullable
        ResultReceived<Player,java.lang.String[]> response)
        Opens a sign editor GUI for the specified player with text already in it.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the editor will be displayed.
        defaultText - The text already in the editor GUI.
        response - The object which will handle the completion of sign editing. The source is the player, the result is the input value from the sign GUI.
